job_description:
Location

United States

Type

Full time

Department

Marketing

Compensation

$117K – $176K • Offers Equity • Offers Bonus

This is the target annual salary range for this role. This range is not inclusive of other additional compensation elements, such as our Bonus program, Equity program, Wellness allowance, and other benefits [US Only] (including medical, dental, vision and 401(k)).

The compensation range provided is influenced by various factors and represents the initial target range. Our salary offerings are dynamic and we strive to ensure that our base salary and total compensation package aligns and recognizes the top talent we aim to attract and retain. The compensation package of the successful candidate is based on various factors such as their skillset, experience, and job scope.

Building the Future of Crypto

Our Krakenites are a world-class team with crypto conviction, united by our desire to discover and unlock the potential of crypto and blockchain technology.

What makes us different?
Kraken is a mission-focused company rooted in crypto values. As a Krakenite, you’ll join us on our mission to accelerate the global adoption of crypto, so that everyone can achieve financial freedom and inclusion. For over a decade, Kraken’s focus on our mission and crypto ethos has attracted many of the most talented crypto experts in the world.

Before you apply, please read the Kraken Culture page to learn more about our internal culture, values, and mission.

As a fully remote company, we have Krakenites in 60+ countries who speak over 50 languages. Krakenites are industry pioneers who develop premium crypto products for experienced traders, institutions, and newcomers to the space. Kraken is committed to industry-leading security, crypto education, and world-class client support through our products like Kraken Pro, Kraken NFT, and Kraken Futures.

Become a Krakenite and build the future of crypto!
The Team
Kraken is looking for a Brand Partnerships Manager to join the Marketing team. Reporting to the Head of Brand Partnerships, you will manage the relationships with our global brand partners, including producing and participating in partnership strategy development, leading partnership activations, campaigns, experiences and more. You will work closely with all Marketing functions including Brand, Social, Events, Growth and Creative teams, as well as Managed Accounts, Product and other departments, to build and execute partnership activations, and capture and convey impact. This is a key role contributing to the long-term growth plan for the Kraken brand and product suite.

The ideal candidate for this position is someone who is tapped into culture – from music to sports, to fashion, to art and beyond – and has experience leading partnerships across a number of these cultural verticals. You are creative, organized, versatile, a strong communicator and collaborator internally and externally, and able to ideate and produce creative, efficient and engaging partnership initiatives content on tight deadlines. You are also a self-starter that has experience wearing multiple hats in a fast-paced environment, switching effortlessly between planning and execution. Building and strengthening relationships is at the core the role, along with unlocking value and furthering Kraken’s Mission through creative brand partnerships. Additionally, you will help to lead and support brand-partnership related IRL activations throughout the year.

This position is a full-time remote position reporting to the Head of Brand Partnerships.

The Opportunity

Help execute the brand partnerships that will support and further Kraken’s Mission and drive brand awareness

Lead the day-to-day partnership management across some of our key brand partnerships, like Williams Racing

Work independently to lead cross-functional partnership initiatives, while building, maintaining and growing strong relationships with internal and external teams

In collaboration with our Head of Brand Partnerships, support all elements of the partner management life cycle: evaluating potential opportunities, ideating and executing valuable initiatives with current partners, framing and assessment of value and impact, negotiating agreements, and implementation and optimization

Connect Kraken business priorities, brand marketing, objectives and key messages across our brand partnerships

Coordinatie and manage pre-activation promotion, on-the-day management and post-activation follow up activities

Collaborate cross-functionally on event execution logistics, asset development, and event communication and execution

Help lead the development of promotional activation content for various distribution channels

Negotiate and manage external partners/vendors

Manage event budgets efficiently through forecasting and tracking

Demonstrate effectiveness of partnership efforts through data collection and reporting

Additional duties and responsibilities as assigned

Skills you should HODL

6+ years of brand partnerships management, planning and execution experience, preferably including brand partnerships experience within the digital assets industry

Strong time management, communication, organizational and multitasking skills, flexibility and professional confidence

Demonstrated ability to efficiently work on multiple project requests simultaneously in a fast-paced environment

Experience working cross-functionally and communicating to a wide range of stakeholders

Experience in a fast paced and high growth environment, ability to pivot to the needs of the market.

Experience across verticals including gaming, sports, art, music, and/or fashion partnerships a plus

Ability to learn and manage a number of different organizational tools

Enjoy and excel at working cross functionally to deliver results through partnerships

Ability to build and manage relationships with product and business leaders, internally and externally

Strong knowledge and passion for the Crypto industry

Great strategic instincts, and can exercise good judgment in ambiguous situations

Ability to travel 15%+ of the time, both domestically and internationally

Nice to haves:

Experience in business development, product or growth a plus

Success negotiating and executing a broad range of partnerships

#LI-Remote
Kraken is powered by people from around the world and we celebrate all Krakenites for their diverse talents, backgrounds, contributions and unique perspectives. We hire strictly based on merit, meaning we seek out the candidates with the right abilities, knowledge, and skills considered the most suitable for the job. We encourage you to apply for roles where you don't fully meet the listed requirements, especially if you're passionate or knowledgable about crypto!

As an equal opportunity employer, we don’t tolerate discrimination or harassment of any kind. Whether that’s based on race, ethnicity, age, gender identity, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, disability, pregnancy, veteran status or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state or local laws.
